source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_00<tab>O'kalkaya has advice for any adventurers headed to the Missing Member.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_00<tab>永遠の乙女亭の前でたたずむオ・カルカヤは、何かを恐れて、苛立っているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_01<tab>O'kalkaya warns you that Captain Rhoswen, leader of the Sanguine Sirens and proprietress of the Missing Member, is in no mood to entertain customers. If you insist upon visiting, O'kalkaya strongly suggests that you first pay your respects and /kneel to the captain.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_01<tab>リムサ・ロミンサでも特に有力な三大海賊のひとつ「紅血聖女団」のオ・カルカヤから、頭領の機嫌を良くするよう依頼された。永遠の乙女亭の中にいる頭領「ローズウェン」にエモート「ひざまずく」をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_02<tab>Rhoswen explains that the Sanguine Sirens are struggling to capture imperial vessels because their rivals, the Kraken's Arms, are seizing them first. Show Captain Rhoswen that you are /disappointed with this turn of events.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_02<tab>ローズウェンは、落胆が激しいため、怒っていたようだ。「ローズウェン」の落胆を、エモート「すごくがっかりする」をすることで代弁してあげよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_03<tab>Brushing aside your gesture of sympathy, Rhoswen muses on how she might motivate her crew to redouble their efforts. Demonstrate to her how you would /rally their spirits.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_03<tab>ローズウェンは、自分の気持ちの理解者に出会えたことで、本音を打ち明け始めた。悩める「ローズウェン」に、エモート「励ます」をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_04<tab>Though your gesturing nearly earns you a gruesome death, you unintentionally inspire Rhoswen to embrace her piratical proclivities and steal better ships so that the Sirens can plunder Garlean outposts. Let O'kalkaya know that her captain is in higher spirits.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_04<tab>ローズウェンの機嫌を直してあげたところ、冷静になったローズウェンは、自ら解決方法を思いついた。永遠の乙女亭の前にいる「オ・カルカヤ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_05<tab>O'kalkaya thanks you for improving Captain Rhoswen's mood and ensuring that the Siren's deckswabs were not disposed of prematurely.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_SEQ_05<tab>オ・カルカヤはローズウェンの苦悩を知り、心を入れ替えたようだ。ガレマール帝国や蛮族などの脅威が増す中、海賊たちにも変革の波が押し寄せているようだ。
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_00<tab>ローズウェンに「ひざまずく」をする
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_01<tab>ローズウェンに「すごくがっかりする」をする
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_TODO_02<tab>ローズウェンを「励ます」をする

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_0<tab>If yer lookin' fer a place to wet yer whistle, scrag, I'd advise ye to turn tail an' run.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_0ああんっ……なんだい、あんた？
この先の酒場に行くつもりなら、やめときな。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_1<tab>Cap'n Rhoswen's in no mood to be entertainin' customers <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this eve)) ((this morn')) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this day)) ((this eve)) /var>)) /var>, an' even when she is, she ain't particularly good at it.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_1ここは、リムサ・ロミンサの
三大海賊のひとつ「紅血聖女団」のシマだからね。
おまけに今日の頭領ときたら、とびきり機嫌が悪い！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_2<tab>Though...maybe dealin' with a customer's the sort o' shite what might shake 'er from 'er doldrums.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_2いや、待て待て待てよ……
あんたなら、頭領の機嫌を直せるかもしれないねえ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_3<tab>But if ye mean to venture inside the Missin' Member, ye best remember to pay yer proper respects to the cap'n─'less ye ain't afraid o' goin' <var 1A 02 /var>missin'<var 1A 01 /var>. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Kneelin'<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> afore 'er would be a good start.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_3ためしに、この酒場「永遠の乙女亭」にいる
頭領「ローズウェン」様に「ひざまず」いて挨拶してみな。
この都市の新参者として、敬意を示すんだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_10<tab>The 'ells ye want, drylander!? We're closed! If ye don't want me Sirens to toss ye out on yer arse, show some respect an' <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>kneel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, scrag!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_10……目ざわりよ。
「ひざまず」いて、あたしに挨拶するか、
ウチの子に腕ずくで追い払われるか……どっちがいい！？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_11<tab>Oho, so <var 08 E905 ((she)) (('e)) /var> knows <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('is)) /var> place! Good!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_11おやまあ、こいつは、ずいぶんと礼儀の正しい子だねぇ。
あたしらが三大海賊の一角「紅血聖女団」と知って、
挨拶に来たのかい？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_12<tab>If only the Krakens 'ad the same sense o' propriety! Bastards keep seizin' every Garlean ship before we can take a crack at 'em!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_12でも、うちは最近、商売あがったりなのさっ！
ここんとこ、獲物の船をライバルの海賊団、
「百鬼夜行」に奪われてばかりでね！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_13<tab>'Tis a sorry state of affairs when yer crew's reduced to preyin' on the leavin's o' that mangy bunch o' man-boys. Me younger self would be right <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>disappointed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to see 'ow far we've fallen.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_13ああ、考えるだけで、またムシャクシャしてきた！
あたしは「すごくがっかり」してんだ、あんたに解るかい！？
解るってなら、身体で表現してみな！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_20<tab>Can't ye see I'm wallowin' in self-pity, scrag!? Ye couldn't possibly understand 'ow <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>disappointed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> I am in meself.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_20あたしは「すごくがっかり」してんのさ。
どれぐらいがっかりしてるか、あんたに解るかい！？
解るってなら、身体で表現してみな！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_21<tab>Hmph, so ye do know somethin' o' me pain. But yer sympathy ain't worth more'n a pint o' piss.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_21その嘆きっぷり……あんたは解ってくれるのかい！？
手下どもは、あたしに頼るばかりだってのにねぇ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_22<tab>It's well an' good we got the Admiral's permission to capture Garlean ships, but what's the use if ye keep on gettin' beat to yer prey!?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_22ウチらは、提督から「私掠船免許」を受けたのさ。
要はガレマール帝国の船なら、襲っていいっていう
「海賊の許可」を受けたってことだね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_23<tab>We built our reputation reavin' right off the coasts o' Vylbrand, not sailin' a dozen malms into the bleedin' sea. The few imperial dogs found in Lominsan territory get snatched by Krakens 'unting in open waters.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_23だが、ウチの船は近海向きの快速船でね、
帝国の沿岸まで、遠洋航海するには不向きなのさ。
お陰で大型船主体の「百鬼夜行」に後れをとっちまってる。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_24<tab>I <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rallied<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me crew's spirits when I said we were revivin' the old ways, but after all our struggles, they seem resigned to lettin' those bastards 'ave all the fun...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_24いっそ、昔ながらの気ままな海賊に
戻ろうかなんて、柄にもなく迷っててね……
さすがのあたしも、誰かに「励まし」てもらいたい気分さ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_30<tab>There's got to be a way to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me Sirens' spirits again...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_30はぁ……
さすがのあたしも、誰かに「励まし」てもらいたい気分さ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_31<tab>Huh? Ye tryin' to make light o' me dilemma? Don't push yer luck, scrag, or I'll gut ye with a hook, like a regular pirate!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_31おやおや、本気で励ましてくれるのかい？
あんたも、つくづく律儀な子だね……いや、待てよ？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_32<tab>Wait─that's it! We're pirates, godsdammit, so we should think like pirates! Bugger keepin' Lominsan waters safe─we'll raid supply shipments to the Garlean outposts along the coasts of Aldenard!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_32ウチらも律儀に、帝国のお膝元まで遠征するこたないね！
エオルゼアの帝国軍施設に出入りする
補給船を狙っちまえばいいんだっ！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_33<tab>Ahahaha! It's so bleedin' simple, I don't know why I didn't think o' this afore! Thank ye for yer unintended inspiration, scrag. To think I almost 'ad ye fed to the sharks!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_RHOSWEN_000_33ははは、あんたのお陰で航路が見えたよ！
外にいる「オ・カルカヤ」に声かけて、土産でも受けとりな！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_40<tab>I gather yer meetin' with the cap'n went well? I could 'ear 'er cacklin' all the way out 'ere.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_40ほんとに頭領の機嫌を直しちまったのかい！？
見事なもんだ、ありがとよ！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_41<tab>Well, whatever ye did, thank ye for doin' it. Last thing we needed was 'er goin' on another rampage, ruinin' deckswabs an' leavin' us with less meat.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_41それにしても、頭領がそんなに悩んでたとはね……。
単に虫の居所が悪くて、当たり散らしてるんだと思ってたよ。
頭領のために、うちらも、もっとしっかりしなくちゃね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_42<tab>'Tain't easy playin' by the Admiral's rules, but if anyone can find a way, Cap'n Rhoswen can!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA014_00662_OKALKAYA_000_42……提督の免許があるってのは、
確かにキュークツだけど、あたしは結構気に入ってるしね。
帝国の連中をぶちのめした時なんて、最高にソーカイさ！
